Class JSPUtility

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    A set of static utilities used by the Java Server Pages.

    Pinaki Poddar

        public static Double toDouble(String v)

      • encodeURL

        public static String encodeURL(String page,
                               Object... params)
        Encodes parameter key-values in a URL.
        Parameters:
        page - the base page
        params - key-value pairs of parameters passed in to the page URL. null or empty argument is allowed.
        Returns:
        a URL encoded string
